title: Pacific Rim 2013 CAM COMPLETE MPEG-2 - JUSTiCE
description:
Pacific Rim 2013 CAM COMPLETE MPEG-2 - JUSTiCE



SOURCE : Ravers/SMY/Youtube


Video and audio both cleaned and given justice.
Check sample and see.....


VIDEO:
Ok the new smy release IS a new video source and is alot better.It has it faults like all cams though.
Main thing is the HC chinese ( i think ) subs and also missing end credits and the scene at the very end.
Audio seems alot better but still cam....also where subs were needed on the old release ...this new audio seems
to have them dubbed in.Most match the subs that were needed....
However this some check 24mins were the dubbing doesn't quite match their mouths ....nothing can be done about that.

WORKDONE:
Well due to lack of time ( work ) i've opted to do a mpeg-2 release as its quicker and also allows me to at least get
a decent Q encode out for ya all.
So took the missing intro off the ravers release ....then added all the smy video...then added end credits and after scene
from youtube.
Now this made it a complete release with a runtime just under 2hrs 5mins...
All pieces were cropped and cleaned with some slight tweaking.If honest,wish i had the vobs ..would have got it even better.

Oh when encoding i left the output as 1:1 pixel so the black border does change but the AR stays intact ...and also forgot to
say i've cropped the movement on the sides and also 90% of the lower subs...some still appear but they were higher up.

Overall ...V8 A6 M6


Oh mpeg-2 ...can play on most dvd players and its close to a dvdr/vobs.Also you can drop this into any dvd authoring app and will
make it a dvdr with vobs etc....within 10mins.Donkey work already done.
